EmailTemplate.name: Quote Create Portal Customer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell RFQ Acknowledgement {Reference Quote#: {!Case.CaseNumber}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. Your RFQ has been received and the ticket tracking number for this inquiry is {!Case.CaseNumber} . If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry or place an order on this quote, please click on the link below and then Login.
For RFQ Status, click here.
Thank you, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
